mapper.insert: INSERT INTO amazonUSapplication( id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{amazonMail}, #{businessName}, #{shopUrl}, #{shopName}, #{applicantName}, #{applicantId}, #{recipientAcc}, #{recipientAccName}, #{recipientId}, #{address}, #{managerName}, #{managerDepartment}, #{managerId}, #{transactionRecordName}, #{applicationFileName}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, status, auditor FROM amazonusapplication WHERE status = #{status} AND auditor = #{auditor}

SELECT id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, status, auditor FROM amazonusapplication WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY uploadTime LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: UPDATE amazonusapplication SET amazonMail = #{amazonMail}, businessName = #{businessName}, shopUrl = #{shopUrl}, shopName = #{shopName}, applicantName = #{applicantName}, applicantId = #{applicantId}, recipientAcc = #{recipientAcc}, recipientAccName = #{recipientAccName}, recipientId = #{recipientId}, address = #{address}, managerName = #{managerName}, managerDepartment = #{managerDepartment}, managerId = #{managerId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName, recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, status, auditor FROM amazonusapplication WHERE businessName = #{accName}

SELECT id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, auditor, foundTime, accName, acc, currency, foreignBank, routing, postScript, note FROM amazonusapplication INNER JOIN foreignfeedback ON amazonusapplication.businessName = foreignfeedback.accName ORDER BY uploadTime LIMIT #{begin}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM amazonusapplication WHERE status >= 0

SELECT id, amazonMail, businessName, shopUrl, shopName, applicantName, applicantId, recipientAcc, recipientAccName recipientId, address, managerName, managerDepartment, managerId, transactionRecordName, applicationFileName, uploadTime, auditor, foundTime, accName, acc, currency, foreignBank, routing, postScript, note FROM amazonusapplication INNER JOIN foreignfeedback ON amazonusapplication.businessName = foreignfeedback.accName WHERE amazonMail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR businessName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR shopName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR applicantName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR recipientAccName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR managerName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR accName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ORDER BY uploadTime
